Section.name: About A1 Global Institute of Engineering & Technology
Section.description:
A1 Global Institute of Engineering & Technology was established in 2009. It is managed by Islamic Educational & Cultural Society and approved by AICTE & affiliated to JNTU, Kakinada. The institute aims high quality technical education to Muslim minorities and other weaker sections of the society and providing affordable education and state-of-art infrastructure. It is located at Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh.
The institute offers UG, PG, MBA & Diploma Courses in various categories. Mentioned below are the details for same:
